xml.lyrics:
I've got a sweet li'l' angel, I love the way she spreads her wings
Yes, got a sweet little angel, I love the way she spreads her wings
Yes, when she spreads her wings around me, I gets joy 'n' ev'rything
Lord, if my baby should quit me, I do believe I would die
Yeah, if my baby should quit me, I do believe I would die
Yes, if you don't love me li'l' angel, please, tell me the reason why
Yes, asked my baby for a nickel, and she gave me a twenty dollar bill
Yeah, I asked my baby for a nickel, and she gave me a twenty dollar bill
Yes, you know I asked her to let's go out and have a good time,
and she bought me a Cadillac Seville
(Trying out this banner exchange service)
